meanings.sent1: She received an uncomplimentary comment about her outfit.
meanings.sent2: The review was uncomplimentary, highlighting all the flaws of the product.
meanings.sent3: Despite the uncomplimentary remark, she remained confident in her abilities.
meanings.sent4: The uncomplimentary feedback hit her like a bucket of cold water.
meanings.sent5: The uncomplimentary description stuck in her mind, making her self-conscious.

meanings.sent1: His uncomplimentary tone made her feel uneasy.
meanings.sent2: The article was filled with uncomplimentary remarks about the politician.
meanings.sent3: Even though it was meant as a joke, his uncomplimentary comment stung a little.
meanings.sent4: The uncomplimentary comparison to a villain was unexpected.
meanings.sent5: The uncomplimentary feedback echoed in her mind, making her doubt her decisions.
